GK19uddkokpu:0: pūrvabhāgaḥ saudhe tuṅge saha dayitayā ko 'pi saṅkrīḍamānaḥ prāpa svāpaṃ paramapuruṣaḥ śeṣabhoge śriyeva /
GK19uddkokpu:1_0: citrā daivī gatiriyamasau śailajāmaṇḍitāyāṃ kāñcyāṃ kampātaṭabhuvi tayānanvito budhyate
GK19uddkokpu:1_1: sma tvāmāninyuḥ subhaga śayitaṃ līlayā nīlakeśyo draṣṭuṃ devaṃ varuṇapurataḥ sampatantyo
GK19uddkokpu:2_0: atrāmuñcannapi bhagavatīkiṅkaroktyā saśaṅkāḥ śuśrāvetthaṃ sa punaravapussaṅgrahāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:2_1: vyomni vāṇīm kṣetre cāsmin sakalavipadāṃ bhañjane pañca māsān āsīthāścet priyajanaviyogārtirūrdhvaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:3_0: ākarṇyemāṃ punariti tathā saiṣa cakre nivāsaṃ kleśo bhūyānapi bahumataḥ ślāghyate
GK19uddkokpu:3_1: cedudarkaḥ tatra dvitrān priyasahacarīviprayogātidīrghān kāmārto 'yaṃ śivaśiva samullaṅghya
GK19uddkokpu:4: caitrārambhe samuditamadhuśrīkaṭākṣābhirāmaṃ cūtāṅkūrāsvadanarasikaṃ kokilaṃ sandadarśa // taṃ kūjantaṃ kalamadhurayā pañcamasvānabhaṅgyā kāntālāpasmaraṇavivaśaḥ kiñcidārādupetya /
GK19uddkokpu:5_0: datvā netrāñjalipuṭabhṛtairarghyamaśrupravāhair jātāśvāsaḥ sphuṭamiti girā śrāvyayā
GK19uddkokpu:5_1: sandideśa atrāyāhi priyasakha nanu svāgataṃ paśya pārśve pratyagrodyanmadhurasakaṇasvedinīṃ
GK19uddkokpu:6_0: tvatsamparkaṃ subhaga niyataṃ kāṅkṣate 'sau vilolā lolambākṣī calakisalayairāhvayantī
GK19uddkokpu:6_1: sarāgā antastoṣaṃ mama vitanuṣe hanta jāne bhavantaṃ skandhāvāraprathamasubhaṭaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:7_0: kūjāvyājāddhitamupadiśan kokilāvyājabandho kāntaiḥ sākaṃ nanu ghaṭayase kāminīrmānabhājaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:7_1: vācālaṃ mā parabhṛta kṛthā māṃ priyāviprayuktaṃ prāyaḥ prāptaṃ praṇayavacanaṃ tvādṛśe
GK19uddkokpu:8_0: kiñcillīnāṃ kisalayapuṭe kokilāmākulātmā tvaṃ cāpaśyan bata virahiṇāṃ yena jānāsi
GK19uddkokpu:8_1: tāpam // yāvatkālaṃ mahitapatagādhīśa kārye niyoktuṃ saṅkocaṃ me vrajati rasanā sandidikṣormṛgākṣyāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:9_0: tāvatkālaṃ tava ca hṛdayaṃ tāntimetīti śaṅke dīnāpannapraṇayaghaṭane dīrghasūtretarasya //
GK19uddkokpu:9_1: sandeśaṃ me naya khagapate sādhaya bhrātṛkṛtyaṃ santāpārtāṃ suvacana samāśvāsaya
GK19uddkokpu:10_0: kāntodantaḥ suhṛdupanato viprayogārditānāṃ prāyaḥ strīṇāṃ bhavati kimapi prāṇasandhāraṇāya
GK19uddkokpu:10_1: gantavyaste tridivavijayī maṅgalāgreṇa deśaḥ prāptaḥ khyātiṃ vihitatapasaḥ prāgjayantasya
GK19uddkokpu:11: pāre cūrṇyāḥ parisarasamāsīnagovindavakṣo- lakṣmīvīkṣāvivalanasudhāśītalaḥ keraleṣu // Kok_1.11
GK19uddkokpu:12: tatra drakṣyasyakhilamahilāmaulimālāyamānāṃ bālāmenāṃ niyatamadhunā madviyogena dīnām /
GK19uddkokpu:13: kalyāṇī sā kanakakadalīkandalīkomalāṅgī kandarpāgniṃ kathamiva kukūlāgnikalpaṃ saheta // Kok_1.12
GK19uddkokpu:14: adhvānaṃ te hitamupadiśāmyaśrameṇaiva gantuṃ snigdhacchāyaistarubhirabhitaḥ śāntagharmapracāram
GK19uddkokpu:15_0: saṃskartāsi dhruvamupagato yatra patrīndra teṣām uddāmānāmapi navanavodyānalīlāyitānām //
GK19uddkokpu:15_1: śrīkāmākṣyā vinatamamarairutsavaṃ phālgunākhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāntyaḥ svabhavanamupārūḍhanānāvimānāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:16: tvatsaṃllāpaśravaṇataralāḥ paścimāmbhodhivelā- paryantaṃ te varuṇanagarīmañjuvācaḥ sahāyāḥ ākarṣantaḥ pratinavalatāpuṣpagandhopahārān āsiñcantaḥ saraṇimabhitaḥ śītalaiḥ śīthuleśaiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:17_1: 'nukūlāḥ vandasvārāt priyasakha punardarśanāyātra śaureḥ kāñcībhartuḥ karigiritaṭe
GK19uddkokpu:18_1: pīṭheṣvaṣṭādaśasu mahitaṃ kāmapīṭhaṃ bhajethāḥ pārekampaṃ svayamiha parā devatā sannidhatte
GK19uddkokpu:19_0: sabhrūcāpaṃ nayanajaladaṃ prāpya yasyāḥ kṛpāpaṃ tuṇḍīrakṣmā sulabhakavitāsasyavṛddhiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:19_1: samindhe uḍḍīyāsmād bakulasarasāt sa tvamudyānadeśāt prādakṣiṇyād vraja parisare
GK19uddkokpu:20_0: mūle yasya prakṛtisubhage muktakailāsalobho devaḥ sākṣādvasati valayāṅkāhvayaścandracūḍaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:20_1: dṛṣṭvā śambhuṃ gaganasaraṇāvujjihāne tvayi drāk pakṣadvandvavyajanapavanoccālitābhyo
GK19uddkokpu:21_1: spaṣṭālakṣyastvayi pika samālambamāne 'mbarāntaṃ kāñcīdeśaḥ kimapi vasudhāṃ bhūṣayan
GK19uddkokpu:22: tatsaundaryāpahṛtahṛdayo mā vilambasva gantuṃ bandhutrāṇād bahumatipadaṃ nāparaṃ tvadvidhānām āśāṃ pāśāyudhatilakitāmāśrayannāttavegaḥ kūlonmīlatkramukakuhalīcāmarāndolitormim /
GK19uddkokpu:23_1: pakṣodyautaiḥ pataga purajitkandharākāṇḍanīlair vyāptābhogā visṛmaratarairvyoma sīmantayantī
GK19uddkokpu:24: suvyaktaṃ te gamanasaraṇiḥ sūtrayedūrdhvamasyāḥ sindhusnehopagatayamunāveṇivīthīvilāsam // cūte cūte kusumakalikāṃ tvāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā sametaṃ bālāśokāhananamaruṇairaṅghribhistanvatīnām
GK19uddkokpu:25_0: tanvaṅgīnāṃ śravaṇasubhagairnūpurāṇāṃ virāvair vācālāḥ syurniyatamabhitaḥ kūlamārāmasīmāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:26_0: tīre tasyā dramiḍasudṛśo darśanīyā vilokya prāyo bhāvī kṣaṇamiva sakhe gacchataste
GK19uddkokpu:27_0: ruddhābhogā dvijavaravidhisnānapūtaistaṭākair draṣṭavyāste tadanu saritaṃ dakṣiṇenāgrahārāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:27_1: sā vaidagdhī śrutiṣu sa punaḥ sarvaśāstrāvagāhas taccāmlānaprasarasarasaṃ niṣkalaṅkaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:28_0: tatratyānāṃ kimiha bahunā sarvametat paṭhantaḥ śṛṅge śṛṅge gṛhaviṭapināṃ spaṣṭayiṣyanti
GK19uddkokpu:28_1: kīrāḥ tānullaṅghya smitakuvalayasnigdhamutkandharāṇāṃ colastrīṇāmayi saphalayan netramutpakṣmamālam
GK19uddkokpu:29_1: kāmaḥ svāmī kila śalabhatāmāpa netrasphuliṅge mā mā bhaiṣīriti bhavabhido darśanāccandramauleḥ
GK19uddkokpu:30_0: śyāmā varṇe vacasi madhurā cañcalā dṛgvilāse vāmotsaṅge lasati karuṇā kāpi kāmaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:30_1: duhānā // pakṣisvānaiḥ paṭumadakalaiḥ svāgatāni bruvāṇā vyākīrṇārghyāḥ kusumamadhubhirvījayantaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:31: tatrārāmāḥ surabhisacivaṃ tvāṃ sakhe mānayeyus tulyaprītirbhavati hi jano rājavadrājamitre kāle tasmin karadhṛtagalannīvayo vārakāntāḥ sambhogānte nibiḍalatikāmandirebhyaścalantyaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:32_1: bhūyo gacchan janapadamimaṃ sa tvamullaṅghya colān ālokethāstaralahariṇīnetratāpiñchitāni
GK19uddkokpu:33: kāntārāṇi prasavaśayanaiśchinnaguñjākalāpaiḥ kuñje kuñje kathitaśabaradvandvalīlāyitāni // tatratyāstvāṃ kusumakalikāśīthudhārāṃ vamanto nīrandhreṣu skhalitagatayo nirjharīśīkareṣu
GK19uddkokpu:35: cumban bimbādharamiva navaṃ pallavaṃ śīthugarbhaṃ prāptāśleṣaḥ stana iva nave korake kāmacārī
GK19uddkokpu:36_0: bhoktāsi tvaṃ kamapi samayaṃ tatra mākandavallīḥ kāntārāge sati vikasite kaḥ pumāṃstyaktumīṣṭe
GK19uddkokpu:37: vidyutvantaṃ navajaladharaṃ manyamānāḥ salīlaṃ nartiṣyanti priyasakha calatpiñchabhārā mayūrāḥ dṛśyā dūre tadanu laharīsampatadrājahaṃsā sā kāverī madajalajharī sahyadantāvalasya /
GK19uddkokpu:38: meghaśyāmo bhujagaśayano medinīhārayaṣṭer madhye yasyā marataka iva prekṣyate raṅganāthaḥ puṇyānasyāstaṭabhuvi purīkharvaṭagrāmaruddhān udyānadruprasavasurabhīn hosalān gāhamānaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:39: lakṣmīnārāyaṇapuramiti khyātamantarmurāreḥ prāpyāvāsaṃ bhava pikapate pāvanānāṃ purogaḥ // tatratyānāṃ ruciracikuranyastasaugandhikānāṃ tāruṇyoṣmāñcitakucataṭīvitruṭatkañcukānām /
GK19uddkokpu:40_1: 'pi tāścenmānagrathitahṛdayāḥ sannatān nādri yeran kāntāḥ kāntān parabhṛta kuhūkāramekaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:42_0: kṣatradhvaṃsāt svayamuparato viprasātkṛtya kṛtsnaṃ pṛthvīcakraṃ bhṛgukulapatiryattaṭe
GK19uddkokpu:42_1: sannidhatte tvañcaddhūmān davahutabhujo jvālamālājaṭālān valgadbhṛṅgān vanaviṭapino
GK19uddkokpu:43_0: dṛṣṭvā dūrādanuminutamāmuṣṇaśītaiḥ samīraiḥ sandigdhāyāṃ vipadi sahasāvṛttirārtiṃ
GK19uddkokpu:43_1: hi sūte dṛṣṭvā tatrāmalakadharaṇīmandiraṃ śārṅgapāṇiṃ tasmācchailāttaṭamavataran
GK19uddkokpu:44: kūle 'mbhodheḥ kramukakalilāṃ keralakṣoṇimagre paśya sphītāṃ bhṛgusutabhujāvikramopakramaṃ yā // Kok_1.41 //
GK19uddkokpu:45: prāptavyaste yadi kṛtamaho vāṅmayītīravāsī devo dakṣādhvaravimathanoḍḍāmaraścandracūḍaḥ /
GK19uddkokpu:46_0: āste śātatriśikhaśikhayā dārukaṃ jaghnuṣī sā yasyādūre mṛgapatiśirastasthuṣī bhadrakālī //
GK19uddkokpu:46_1: siktaḥ svacchairjharajalakaṇaistaṃ bhaja vyomni tiṣṭhan muktācchannāsitanavapaṭīkāyamānāyamānaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:47_0: dhvāṅkṣabhrāntyā yadi parijanāstvāṃ samutsārayeran kūjāṃ kiñcit kuru nanu girā vyajyate
GK19uddkokpu:47_1: sannasaṃśca itthaṃ bhaktyā puramathanamārādhya labdhaprasādaḥ kṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṭaḥ pathi
GK19uddkokpu:48_1: rājadhānīm yeṣāṃ vaṃśe samajani hariścandranāmā narendraḥ pratyāpattiḥ pataga yadupajñaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:49_0: yuddhe yeṣāmahitahataye caṇḍikā sannidhatte teṣāmeṣāṃ stutiṣu na bhavet kasya vaktraṃ
GK19uddkokpu:49_1: pavitram putrasyāsau priyasakha iti prītigarbhaiḥ kaṭākṣair dṛṣṭastasyāṃ puri viharatā
GK19uddkokpu:50: tasyaivāgre sadayamabalālūnasūnapravāle bālodyāne kvacana viharan mārgakhedaṃ vijahyāḥ // kelīyānakvaṇitaraśanā komalābhyāṃ padābhyām ālīhastārpitakaratalā tatra cedāgatā syāt /
GK19uddkokpu:51_0: svātī nāma kṣitipatisutā sevituṃ devamasyāḥ svairālāpaistava pika girāṃ kāpi śikṣā
GK19uddkokpu:53_1: bāṣpaleśam digyātavyā yadapi bhavato dakṣiṇā rakṣaṇārthaṃ matprāṇānāṃ punarapi sakhe
GK19uddkokpu:54_0: dhūtārāmaṃ mukuṭataṭinīmārutaistatra śambhoḥ sampadgrāmaṃ yadi na bhajase janmanā
GK19uddkokpu:54_1: kiṃ bhṛtena saudhaistuṅgairhasadiva sudhākṣālitai rājatādriṃ tejorāśeḥ praviśa bhavanaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:55_1: līlām utkīrṇānāṃ kanakavalabhīṣūdgato viṣkirāṇāṃ tyaktāśaṅkaṃ praṇama giriśaṃ dhyānaniṣkampagātraḥ
GK19uddkokpu:56: kaṇṭhacchāyā pratiphalati kiṃ bharturityadriputryā nidhyātaḥ san kutukanibhṛtairnetrapātaiḥ pavitraiḥ // Kok_1.52 //
GK19uddkokpu:58: gāyantīnāṃ kvacidapi sakhe komalān kinnarīṇāṃ vīṇārāvānupaśṛṇu bhavatkūjitenāviśiṣṭān // Kok_1.53
GK19uddkokpu:59: divyaiśvaryaṃ diśasi bhajatāṃ vartase bhikṣamāṇo gaurīmaṅke vahasi bhasitaṃ pañcabāṇaṃ cakartha
GK19uddkokpu:60_0: kṛtsnaṃ vyāpya sphurasi bhuvanaṃ mṛgyase cāgamāntaiḥ kaste tattvaṃ prabhavati paricchettumāścaryasindho
GK19uddkokpu:60_1: itthaṃ stutvā bahirupavanopāntamākandaśṛṅge yāvadbhānurvrajati caramaṃ bhūdharaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:61: drakṣyasyanvaksaphalanayanaṃ tāṇḍavānīndumauler lāsyakrīḍālalitagirijāpāṅgasambhāvitāni // tasmin kāle balimahajuṣāṃ vāravāmālakānāṃ sthālīcakre stanataṭadhṛte sānurāge hṛdīva /
GK19uddkokpu:62_0: bimbavyājādviśati bhavati syādamuṣyeti śaṅke spaṣṭāṅkasya kṣaṇamudayagasyendubimbasya
GK19uddkokpu:62_1: lakṣmīḥ viṣvakkīrṇairiva paśupateḥ kandharākāntipuñjair vītāloke jagati timirairvyomanīlābjabhṛṅgaiḥ
GK19uddkokpu:63_0: viśrāntaḥ san kvacana vipule vṛkṣaśākhākuṭumbe tāṃ tatraiva kṣapaya rajanīṃ śrāntavisrastapakṣaḥ
GK19uddkokpu:64_0: svedāṅkūrān suratajanitān subhruvāṃ corayantaḥ seviṣyante niśi parabhṛta tvāṃ sukhena
GK19uddkokpu:65: prasthātuṃ tvaṃ punarapi sakhe prakramethāḥ prabhāte svātmakleśaḥ suhṛdupakṛtau tvādṛśānāṃ sukhāya // Kok_1.59 //
GK19uddkokpu:66: padmopāntāduṣasi ramaṇe prāpnuvatyeva pārśvaṃ madhye mārajvaraparavaśāṃ vīkṣamāṇo rathāṅgīm
GK19uddkokpu:67: dūraṃ prāpte mayi vidhivaśāddūyamānāṃ sakhīṃ te smāraṃ smāraṃ dviguṇagamanotsāha eva dhruvaṃ syāḥ // Kok_1.60 //
GK19uddkokpu:68: dṛṣṭvā devaṃ parisarajuṣaṃ śambare bālakṛṣṇaṃ lopāmudrāsakhatilakitaṃ diṅmukhaṃ bhūṣayiṣyan
GK19uddkokpu:69_0: kolānelāvanasurabhilān yāhi yatra prathante velātītaprathitavacasaḥ śaṅkarādyāḥ kavīndrāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:69_1: unmajjadbhiḥ punariva javāt pakṣavadbhirgirīndrair vṛndairnāvāṃ bhujapaṭalikoḍḍāmarairgāhyamānam
GK19uddkokpu:70_0: lakṣmījāneḥ śayanasadanaṃ puṣpavāṭaṃ purāreḥ pākasthānaṃ nikhilamarutāṃ paśya vārānnidhānam
GK19uddkokpu:71_0: deśāddeśaṃ vrajasi kutukottānamugdhānanānāṃ vāmākṣīṇāṃ nayanaculakaiḥ sādaraṃ pīyamānaḥ //
GK19uddkokpu:71_1: kuryāt prītiṃ tava nayanayoḥ kukkuṭakroḍanāma prāsādāgrollikhitagaganaṃ pattanaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:72_1: gehe gehe navanavasudhākṣālitaṃ yatra saudhaṃ saudhe saudhe surabhikusumaiḥ kalpitaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:73_0: talpe talpe rasaparavaśaṃ kāminīkāntayugmaṃ yugme yugme sa khalu viharan viśvavīro
GK19uddkokpu:73_1: manobhūḥ vyarthaṃ karṇe navakuvalayaṃ vidyamāne kaṭākṣe bhāro hāraḥ stanakalaśayorbhāsure
GK19uddkokpu:74: yatra snigdheṣvapi kacabhareṣveṇaśābekṣaṇānāṃ mādyadbhṛṅge sati parimale maṅgalāya prasūnam yatra jñātvā kṛtanilayanāmindirāmātmakanyāṃ manye snehākulitahṛdayo vāhinīnāṃ vivoḍhā /
GK19uddkokpu:76_1: kṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭiṃ kathamapi tataḥ kautukānāṃ nidānād uḍḍīyethāḥ pathi viṭapināṃ puṣpamādhvīṃ
GK19uddkokpu:77_0: hāraṃ hāraṃ madanapṛtanākāhalaiḥ kaṇṭhanādair utkaṇṭhānāṃ janapadamṛgīlocanānāṃ manāṃsi //
GK19uddkokpu:77_1: brahmābhyāsapraśamitakalīn prāpya dīprān prakāśān śvetāraṇyaṃ vraja bahumataṃ dhāma
GK19uddkokpu:78_0: dṛṣṭvā dūre sakṛdapi janā yanna paśyantyavaśyaṃ mṛtyorvaktraṃ niṭilaghaṭitabhrūkuṭīkaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:79_0: yenākrānte sati giripatau loṣṭamānāsyacakraś cakrandādhaḥkṛtabhujavano rakṣasāṃ cakravartī
GK19uddkokpu:79_1: pārśve yasya pravahati nilā nāma kallolinī sā sandhyānṛttabhramiṣu patitā mastakājjāhnavīva
GK19uddkokpu:80_0: nāvākṣetrapraṇayi ramayākrāntadormadhyamāste kūle yasyāḥ kuvalayadalaśyāmalaṃ dhāma
GK19uddkokpu:80_1: kiñcit sākaṃ kāntairmilati lalitaṃ keralīnāṃ kadambe matpreyasyāḥ priyasakha mahāmāghasevāgatāyāḥ
GK19uddkokpu:81: pāyaṃ pāyaṃ mukhaparimalaṃ mohanaṃ yatra mattāḥ prāyo 'dyāpi
GK19uddkokpu:83: śaivālaughacchuritakamalā saikatasraṃsihaṃsā nītā kārśyaṃ tapanakiraṇairvāsareṣveṣu sindhuḥ
GK19uddkokpu:84: ākīrṇāsyāmalakanikaraiḥ śroṇivibhraṃśikāñcīṃ manye dīnāṃ virahadaśayā preyasīṃ me 'nuyāyāt śāstā tasyā yadi taṭapathaiḥ śambarakroḍavāsī tiṣṭhannaśve javini mṛgayākautukī sañcareta
GK19uddkokpu:85: lumpestasya śramajalakaṇān komalaiḥ pakṣavātair bhūyāt prītyai laghu ca samaye sevanaṃ hi prabhūṇām // Kok_1.75 //
GK19uddkokpu:86: sarvotkṛṣṭā jagati viditāḥ keraleṣu dvijendrā vallīkauṇyostadapi mahimā kāpi madhyaśritānām
GK19uddkokpu:87_0: tatrāpyasyāḥ salilapavanā yatra yatra prathante teṣāṃ teṣāmatiśayajuṣaḥ śīlavidyānubhāvāḥ

GK19uddkokpu:178: smāraṃ smāraṃ kathamapi mayā muhyatā sahyate 'sau mando vāyuḥ sutanu
GK19uddkokpu:180: tīrtvā rātriṃ virahamahatīṃ tīvratāpāṃ kathañcid dṛṣṭvā bhānoḥ kiraṇamaruṇaṃ jambhaśatrordigante
GK19uddkokpu:181_0: pratyudyāntīṃ tvaritamabalāṃ śliṣyate bhāgyasīmne sāraṅgākṣi spṛhayati mano hanta
GK19uddkokpu:181_1: cakrākhyayūne utkaṇṭho 'smi tvaduditadhiyā mugdhahaṃsīnināde tvadbhūṣāyāṃ hariti
GK19uddkokpu:182_0: tvatsaṃspṛṣṭe mama ca vapuṣi prema badhnāmi kānte satyaṃ prāṇānapi paramahaṃ tvatpriyān
GK19uddkokpu:182_1: dhārayāmi tvaṃ cāhaṃ ca kṣitimupagatāvityaviśleṣacintā nindāvantau smara iti mitho
GK19uddkokpu:183: spṛśyete nau niśi śaśikarairaṅgake yaugapadyāt tenāpyasti dviradagamane satyamāśleṣabuddhiḥ hāhantāsminnasulabhamithodarśane viprayoge saivālambo mama bhagavatī bhāvanākalpavallī /
GK19uddkokpu:184: tvāmāsīnāmasakṛdanayā gāḍhamāliṅgya rāgād aṅkārūḍhāmalaghujaghane nocitaṃ vaktumanyat // Kok_2.58
GK19uddkokpu:185: jātaṃ ceto madanasubhaṭasyādya yogyaṃ śaravyaṃ naikacchidraṃ niyatamamutaḥ subhru vibhraṃśi dhairyam /
GK19uddkokpu:186_0: kālāt kṣīṇe punaravayave vardhate kevalaṃ no tāpastīvrasmarahutabhujā tasya varṇodgamo
GK19uddkokpu:186_1: 'pi evaṃprāyā na hi na virahe jīvituṃ santyupāyāḥ satyaṃ taistaiḥ kṛtadhṛtirahaṃ
GK19uddkokpu:187_0: niścityaivaṃ nirupamaguṇe sāhasebhyo nivṛttā tvaṃ ca snānādiṣu savayasāṃ prārthanāṃ
GK19uddkokpu:187_1: mā niṣedhīḥ tīrṇaprāyo virahajaladhiḥ śailakanyāprasādāc cheṣaṃ māsadvitayamabale
GK19uddkokpu:188_0: dhūpodgāraiḥ surabhiṣu tato bhīru saudhāntareṣu krīḍiṣyāvo navajaladharadhvānamandrāṇyahāni
GK19uddkokpu:188_1: kacciccitte sphurati capalāpāṅgi cūrṇyāṃ kadācit srastottaṃsaṃ dhavalanayanaṃ dhautabimbādharoṣṭham
GK19uddkokpu:189: snānānte te mukhamupasakhi prekṣamāṇe mayi drāg- vakṣodaghne payasi punarapyāvayormajjanaṃ tat // Kok_2.62 //
GK19uddkokpu:190: āśliṣyantaṃ viṭapabhujayā tatra vallīranekāḥ krīḍārāme kamapi taruṇaṃ vīkṣya mākandavṛkṣam
GK19uddkokpu:191: sācīkṛtya sphuradadharayā caṇḍi vaktraṃ bhavatyā subhrūbhaṅgaḥ sajalakaṇikaḥ preṣito mayyapāṅgaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ praṇayini ruṣā bimbito 'haṃ stane te sairandhryajñā
GK19uddkokpu:193_0: mā pāṭīraṃ pulakini punaścātra limpeti śaṃsaty ālīvṛnde smitajuṣi kṛtā dṛktvayā vrīlagarbhā
GK19uddkokpu:193_1: uccinvatyāḥ kisalayarucā pāṇinodyānapuṣpaṃ sākaṃ bhṛṅgaistava mayi mukhāmbhojasaurabhyalubdhe
GK19uddkokpu:194_0: reṇutrastā iva sumanasāṃ dakṣiṇāḥ kelisakhyaḥ kañcitkālaṃ karakisalayairapyadhurlocanāni //
GK19uddkokpu:194_1: ityetasmānmama kuśalitāṃ viddhyabhijñānadānād bhūyaścaikaṃ śṛṇu sahacarīṃ dhūtanaikānunītim
GK19uddkokpu:195_0: kelīhaṃse smarajuṣi haṭhāccumbatīṣatstanantīṃ tvaṃ tu smṛtvā kimapi bahalavrīlamālokathā
GK19uddkokpu:195_1: mām rāgo nāma truṭati viraheṇeti lokapravādas tvatsambaddho mama śataguṇaḥ saṅgamādviprayoge /
GK19uddkokpu:196: so 'yaṃ bhedo viṣayabhidayā saṅgame tvaṃ kilaikā viśleṣe tu tribhuvanamidaṃ jāyate tvanmayaṃ hi // Kok_2.67 //
GK19uddkokpu:197: etatkṛtyaṃ priyasakha mama bhrāturārtasya kṛtvā nāsīraḥ syā jagati karuṇāśālināṃ saṃvibhāge
GK19uddkokpu:198: śaṃsanti tvāṃ nanu parabhṛtaṃ śaiśave yadbhṛto 'nyaiḥ patrivrātābharaṇa bharaṇenādya sa tvaṃ pareṣām // Kok_2.68 //
GK19uddkokpu:199: evaṃ tasyā virahavidhuraṃ jīvitaṃ sthāpayitvā gaccha svecchāviharaṇa yathāprārthitaṃ digvibhāgam
GK19uddkokpu:200: mānyaśrīḥ syānmadananṛpateḥ kokilā te 'nukūlā bhūyānmaivaṃ sakṛdapi tayā
